jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Become a part of the winter internship- where you will get a peek of what it takes and how it feels to work in the Business Intelligence field in Gojek. 

The timeline from this internship program is:
December 16th, 2019 - February 14th, 2020

This application will close on November 30th, 2019
jobsJson.description:
Become a part of the winter internship- where you will get a peek of what it takes and how it feels to work in the Business Intelligence field in Gojek. 

The timeline from this internship program is:
December 16th, 2019 - February 14th, 2020

This application will close on November 30th, 2019
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• You will work on challenging internal Business Intelligence project in a group set up
  • You will receive hands-on mentoring from our senior engineers and analysts
  • You will receive sharing sessions about data structure, data visualization, and various tech stacks we have from our senior engineers

• 3rd year or final year University Students or Fresh Graduates preferably from these backgrounds (Statistics/Mathematics/Computer Science/Informatics Engineering/Information System) Preferably in the final year.
  • Have basic knowledge and experience working with SQL along with writing in Python/R
  • Have worked on analytical projects or able to do data visualization.
  • Curious, able to learn independently and a good team player
  • High learning agility
  • Passionate about Data
